fightingStyles.name: Archery
fightingStyles.description: You gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls you make with ranged weapons.

fightingStyles.name: Defense
fightingStyles.description: While you are wearing armor, you gain a +1 bonus to AC.

fightingStyles.name: Dueling
fightingStyles.description: When you are wielding a melee weapon in one hand and no other weapons, you gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls with that weapon.

fightingStyles.name: Great Weapon Fighting
fightingStyles.description: When you roll a 1 or 2 on a damage die for an attack you make with a melee weapon that you are wielding with two hands, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

1.name: Second Wind
1.description: You have a limited well of stamina that you can draw on to protect yourself from harm.

2.name: Action Surge
2.description: You can push yourself beyond your normal limits for a moment.

3.name: Martial Archetype
3.description: You choose an archetype that you strive to emulate in your combat styles and techniques.

5.name: Extra Attack
5.description: You can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.

9.name: Indomitable
9.description: You can reroll a saving throw that you fail.

11.name: Extra Attack (2)
11.description: You can attack three times whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.

20.name: Extra Attack (3)
20.description: You can attack four times whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.

1.name: Expertise
1.description: Choose two of your skill proficiencies. Your proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check you make that uses either of the chosen proficiencies.

1.name: Sneak Attack
1.description: You know how to strike subtly and exploit a foe's distraction. Once per turn, you can deal an extra 1d6 damage.

1.name: Thieves' Cant
1.description: During your rogue training you learned thieves' cant, a secret mix of dialect, jargon, and code.

2.name: Cunning Action
2.description: You can take a bonus action on each of your turns to Dash, Disengage, or Hide.

3.name: Roguish Archetype
3.description: You choose an archetype that you emulate in the exercise of your rogue abilities.

fightingStyles.name: Archery
fightingStyles.description: You gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls you make with ranged weapons.

fightingStyles.name: Defense
fightingStyles.description: While you are wearing armor, you gain a +1 bonus to AC.

fightingStyles.name: Dueling
fightingStyles.description: When you are wielding a melee weapon in one hand and no other weapons, you gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls with that weapon.

fightingStyles.name: Two-Weapon Fighting
fightingStyles.description: When you engage in two-weapon fighting, you can add your ability modifier to the damage of the second attack.

1.name: Favored Enemy
1.description: You have studied, tracked, and learned to effectively counter certain types of creatures.

1.name: Natural Explorer
1.description: You are particularly familiar with one type of natural environment and are adept at traveling and surviving in such regions.

2.name: Spellcasting
2.description: You have learned to use the magical essence of nature to cast spells.

3.name: Ranger Archetype
3.description: You choose an archetype that you strive to emulate.

3.name: Primeval Awareness
3.description: You can use your action and expend one ranger spell slot to focus your awareness on the region around you.

5.name: Extra Attack
5.description: You can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.
